mapper.insert: insert into admin_board (admin_bno, user_id, board_no, board_name, board_subject, board_title, board_content, board_written_time, board_modify_time, board_clicked, board_like, board_group, board_step, board_indent) values (admin_seq.nextval,#{user_id}, #{comm_no }, 'community', #{comm_subject }, #{comm_title }, #{comm_content }, #{comm_written_time }, #{comm_modify_time }, #{comm_clicked }, #{comm_like }, #{comm_group }, #{comm_step },#{comm_indent })

insert into admin_board (admin_bno, user_id, board_no, board_name, board_title, board_content, board_written_time, board_modify_time, isbn, board_ref, board_open) values (admin_seq.nextval,#{user_id}, #{review_no}, 'review', #{review_title}, #{review_content}, #{review_written_date}, #{review_modify_date}, , #{isbn}, #{review_ref}, #{review_open})
